name: S.A.I.K.O.U. ( サムライ アニメ アイドル カタナ 抹消 ufo)
name_original: S.A.I.K.O.U. ( サムライ アニメ アイドル カタナ 抹消 ufo)
description:
Oh no! Some evil UFOs abducted your adoring fans. They're all dead now, but you can still seek revenge. Obliterate as many as you can with your magic Katana, as a Samurai Anime Idol!

S.A.I.K.O.U. is a wacky japanese-style infinite and procedurally (randomly) generated shoot-em-up arcade game. Defeat foes and earn as many points as you can!

THE UFOs

ASUKA

KAITO

KATASHI

NIKO

author's note: this is the first game i've ever made in godot. if u see any bugs worth reporting, i'd really appreciate if u told me thru the comments or thru my twitter @shadink6! have fun :D
